Her neck and arms had also put on some weight, though nowhere near as much as the rest of her body. Still, they jiggled as Annie moved her plump little body.

That was perhaps what made her weight gain all the more noticeable. Annie's body was a constantly wobbling, jiggling mass, striving to burst from or escape her clothes. Annie didn't even bother to adjust the shirt, as her many attempts had proven there was no chance of the garment covering her up completely.

It was the start of December, and that was an exciting month.

Both Haley and Annie had been born in this very month, Annie on the 5th, and Haley on the 15th. And with Christmas just around the corner after that, it meant that December was a very exciting month for those two girls. And combined with Thanksgiving, it also meant food; lots and lots of food.

How much extra food was honestly hard to say. In truth, the three ate almost constantly when they weren't at school or asleep, or simply constantly in Jessica's case. And if anything, Jessica's addiction to baking was only getting worse, even starting to interfere with her work schedule. There were only two things Jessica loved more then baking, and that was the two tiny terrors currently in the living room eating the previous batch of cookies. The two were watching a movie while Mom got the next batch ready to go in the oven. The plate of cookies sat between the two on the couch, and though neither one said anything, both were surprisingly deep in thought.

Haley looked at her younger sister with a mixture of awe and disgust. She'd gotten so fat! Her belly stretched out to her knees, and her love handles and rolls were far too large for a child her size. Though hard to see under the blubber of her upper body, Haley knew her lower half had also plumped up. Mom had taken Annie clothes shopping twice more since their Back-to-School shopping, and it looked like Tubby the Destroyer of Desserts would need to go again before too long. Especially after this month, thought Haley, as she thought about the sheer gluttony this month would doubtless entail. As Annie grabbed and ate another three cookies, Haley watched her plump cheeks and developing double chin. She mentally shook her head, and wondered how her sister couldn't tell how big she was getting.

Annie knew considerably more then her older sister thought. The truth was she knew how big she was; she just didn't care. And truthfully, though it was hard to tell under her girth, Annie was at last starting to grow up instead of out. Haley, on the other hand, was a different story. Basketball had wrapped for the year last month, and with soccer not starting until late February, Haley now had a lot of time on her hands. Unfortunately for her waistline, she chose to fill her hands with her Mom's delicious and fattening treats. This was made even worse by the fact that Haley's current growth spurt was also at an end, giving the calories nowhere to go but out. Annie looked at her growing sister. Her belly was tight against her shirt, and her belly button was clearly visible. Annie kept sneaking glances as Haley ate, watching as her shirt rode further and further up as she filled her belly. If she kept up at this rate, it wouldn't be too long before she was as wide as Annie, and even with her natural obliviousness, she couldn't fail to notice her weight gain then.

Both girls, however, paled next to Mom.

Jessica had blown up like a balloon over the last couple of months. When the harshest physical activity you do all day in housework, and you fill nearly every waking moment with eating, it was only to be expected. She'd finally passed the point where she was baking too much for even her daughters to keep up with her output, so Jessica had taken to eating more to avoid wasting a single crumb. Her standard lunch, which had consisted of two whopper meals, had grown to include a third, and a second stop on the way home. After school snacks had also grown to include an entire pie rather then a mere slice, and eating cupcakes had become as common as breathing.

"Next batch is in!" Mom said as she came into the living room. The two girls got quite the show as Jessica came into the room, wearing naught but her painfully stretched underwear. Her belly was divided into two large rolls even while standing up, with a third fold of fat under her bust. Her belly was beginning to droop, and was giving the indication that it would eventually be an apron belly. Her boobs were straining her large bra past its limits, and her upper arms were noticeably girthy. Her hips had widened a fair bit, but paled next to her ass. Her butt had grown absolutely huge. The tremendous, wobbling extremity was covered with cellulite and proved a massive hazard whenever she was walking by something. Her thighs had kept pace, and were rapidly approaching "thunder thighs" territory.

Grabbing a large plate, she heaped it with cookies and brownies, then sat down on the loveseat. Her drooping derriere hit the cushions long before the rest of her sunk in. The loveseat gave a creak as it took the full load of her weight, and Haley found her eyes locked on her Mom's belly as it spread over her lap. Each of the three had their own thoughts as they feasted in silence.

Haley couldn't believe how fat her mom and sister had gotten, and how she was the only one who was still skinny.

Annie wondered how long it'd be before Haley was as big or bigger then Mom, and whether or not she should have more cookies or grab some pie next.

Jessica was wondering if she had any more brownies kicking around, and what kind of cakes to make for her daughter's birthdays.

This is the branch of the story for people that would like to focus on the children. The story is still "Adult weight gain", so Jessica will never stop gaining weight (at least, as anything other than a plot device to gain more weight later, like a crash/fad diet or something). But this branch, at least for the immediate future, is for focusing on the effect Jessica's gluttony is having on her kids, and how much she seeks to indulge them and/or is blind to their gaining compared to her own enormous, adult self. After all, fat adults can raise even fatter kids. Anyway, this was just to segue from the previous chapter's strange ending, so on to the story!

************************************

Ever since Jessica started ramping up the baking, Annie noticed. Annie was a very observant child. And although Jessica had ramped it up to the point that her two kids couldn't keep up... Annie was determined. She loved her mom's baking, and she wanted more of it in her belly. She wanted her belly to grow, to be able to handle more and more of that delicious sugary goodness!

Meanwhile, Haley was looking on in horror as her sister "obliviously" stuffed herself fuller and fuller every night. But in reality, it was Haley who didn't realize what she herself was doing. It turns out, when both your mom and younger sister are stuffing their faces with junk food night after night, there isn't much you can do but join them. After all, if she was still eating less than her younger sister, that must mean she's fine, right? Older kids are supposed to eat more, after all!

So with this pattern continuing, and both girls continuing to expand at a rapid rate, doing almost nothing but eating and watching TV while at home, the evening of the 4th rolled around and Jessica asked Annie what kind of cake she'd like tomorrow.

I bet she doesn't care as long as she gets a whole one to herself, though Haley snarkily. But even despite this thought... she was shocked when her little sister actually said it out loud.

"Uhm... I was thinking, mommy, all of these brownies and cookies every night have been so good, can I just get a whole chocolate cake for myself? You can make whatever kind of cake for you and Haley, too!" Annie replied, half-giddily.

Jessica was taken aback at first, since this did seem like a pretty ridiculous request at face value. But when she thought about the actual ingredient list for the cakes she'd normally bake for birthdays, she realized... huh, I guess that would be only a little over a third of my usual baking load these days. A normal person would take that thought and realize what utter pigs they had been turning their family into, but Jessica was fully giving into gluttony and instead replied kindly,

"Sure thing, honey. I'll make a similar one for myself. Haley, do you want one the same size?"

Haley was just kind of in shock at this point and replied cautiously, "Uhm, sure, mom...." After all, she didn't have to finish it. She had self control, unlike Annie! And besides that, she wasn't even sure she could finish one. With that, the trio continued their evening binge watching reruns on the couch until it was time to go to bed, with Annie practicing her appetite by gorging herself as much as possible, and Haley eating more than usual just because she was in a mind-numbing state of shock from the conversation that had just transpired.


Annie's birthday happened to be on a Saturday this year (so Haley was stuck with a Thursday in a couple of weeks), and with the day off from school, the family pigged out together with no regard for the cakes that would come later. For breakfast, Jessica made them all huge stacks of pancakes, waffles, and french toast, all high-carb foods that were of course slathered with butter and syrup. Haley was looking at Annie inhaling food and wondering when she was going to pop, when all of a sudden, she actually heard a pop... but not where she expected it from. She looked down and saw that her own jeans button had actually popped off. Ugh, they shrunk in the wash.

"Annie, I know it's your birthday but would you mind if mom took us clothes shopping today around lunch?"

"*mph* no *munch* 's fine, my *gobble* clothes are getting pretty tight, *swallow* too!"

What does she mean, too? Most of my clothes are fine, I just don't want mom's laundry skills to make me go to school naked.... thought Haley.

"Hey, don't I get a say in this?" Jessica jokingly interjected. "But yeah, I guess it's a good time to upgrade both of your wardrobes. We can go to a few fast food drive-throughs while we're out!"

Haley mentally made a note that her mom was thinking of more food later even as she gobbled down chocolate-chip pancakes and belgian waffles in the same forkful, not even realizing that at this point, she was nearly matching her mother bite for bite, paying much more attention to the fact that Annie was eating more than either of them.

As far as Haley was concerned, the trip outside was uneventful. Haley completely ignored that she now had to shop in the same Husky section that her sister had been shopping at for a few months now, instead chalking up her new clothing size to a growth spurt that had ended early last month. The 5 drive-throughs they visited, getting an average of two adult meals per person per restaurant, was also uneventful to Haley. She ate her share and was fairly satisfied, and as Annie kept begging for more, Haley accepted more as well when it landed in her lap.

When dinner rolled around, Haley was... kind of full. As soon as they got home, Jessica had handed out brownies as usual, which she had finished baking right before they left. So Haley was actually a little surprised--she had forgotten--when Jessica came out holding a large chocolate cake, very generously frosted, with candles denoting Annie's new age.

"And don't worry, honey, this one is just yours. I just didn't want to bring them all out at once, or I might've dropped them!"

Truth be told, the family did have trays large enough for holding three of these cakes on them, but Jessica's maneuverability had suffered a bit with her increasing waistline, so her fear of tripping while carrying that much cake was not unfounded.

When the last of the cakes was brought out, the three dug in with gusto. These cakes were the best Jessica had ever bake! ... if she did say so herself. But her daughters clearly felt the same way!

Annie was less than a quarter of the way through when she gave up any pretenses of using a fork and just started digging in with her hands. As such, she ended up finishing her cake first, her new tent of a shirt not being strained too much by her taut belly.

Jessica was having a bit more trouble... but only because she hadn't gone shopping for herself today. At halfway through, as she was starting to slow down, she undid her pants button of her own accord, letting her belly swell outwards and giving her ample room to finish.

Haley, on the other hand, had never even considered eating as much food as she had today. At halfway through, despite the ample give of her clothes, she put her fork down in defeat. It wasn't the cake itself, it was just everything else she had stuffed herself silly with. For the first time ever, she noticed her belly was a globe in front of her. Of course, it was super hard, so she still wouldn't entertain the thought of being "fat"--no, that word was reserved for the behemoth bellies her mother and sister carried. But even so, she figured maybe she had eaten quite a bit today, to have such a big "food baby". It was at this point that she noticed her little sister eyeing her cake....

"Yes, Annie, you can have the rest of mine."

"Oh, in that case, I'll take some as well!" Jessica interjected.

It was only five minutes before the remaining half of the large chocolate cake was eaten. Jessica leaned back and rubbed her belly. Annie thoroughly licked every last bit of icing off of her slathered fingers before doing the same. Haley just groaned, the reality of the day's eating starting to catch up with her.

Annie was the first to speak up again. "We should do this... more often...."

Jessica just chuckled. Her little daughter was so adorable! Though, she wouldn't mind really stuffing herself like this every so often... the normal fare of her baked goods was satisfying, but it no longer gave her a really stomach-stretching feeling, and she felt like maybe she should fix that....


From there, the days passed with a steady increase of gluttony, all three pigs of the household stretching their stomachs to new limits on a daily basis. When the evening before Haley's birthday came around...

Hannah had it all: a handsome, devoted husband; big house in suburban Sycomore Hill; a fancy car; expensive wardrobe; and a membership to the local country club.

In spite of her good fortune, Hannah was bored and somewhat lonely. While she had some acquaintances that she called friends, she spent most of her time alone, longing for something that she couldn’t name. She loved her husband, but his job kept him busy, and she had hours and hours to fill on her own each day.

Recently, Hannah had discovered that cooking was enjoyable, and she began to try new recipes on a regular basis. She liked brunch food the best, and with those hours wide open in her usual routine, she began making herself brunch almost every day. The cooking challenged her, and her abilities improved with each new dish.

With this new hobby, Hannah noted that her clothing was getting a bit tight, but saw this as more of an indication that she should probably upgrade the clothes in her closet rather than a problem with her weight. She had never been much of a workout buff, but she did use the country club fitness facilities sometimes and thought that this would keep her close to the 5’7” 130 pounds at which she had begun her marriage a couple of years ago, regardless of other activities. As such, she invested in some new yoga pants, bras, and tops, willfully ignorant of the fact that she now weighed 147 pounds, the heaviest she had been in her life.

In her search for new recipes, Hannah discovered Carmen Colazione, an Italian-American YouTube chef who shared some amazing concoctions. Hannah had yet to find one of Carmen’s creations that she didn’t love, but was also intrigued by something else about Carmen. Scrolling through Carmen’s channel, one could see that she had changed. She had begun as a sort of normal looking girl teaching cooking techniques, but as time passed, she had morphed into an increasingly large woman. With that, Hannah noted, she took on a more outsized personality, dressing to show off her ever bigger boobs, and adopting her catchphrase, “For some, it might be too much, but I’M EXTRA!”, usually uttered when adding things like more butter or additional chocolate chips to a dish.

The more Hannah watched Carmen and ate her recipes, the more she was mesmerized. She was constantly googling Carmen, looking at before and after pictures, and engaging in her favorite activity, often performed while eating: reading comments that people made about Carmen. They could be loosely categorized into three groups: comments about the dishes; fat shaming remarks; and Hannah’s favorites - encouragement to keep eating, how hot Carmen looked, or best of all, a combination of both.

Hannah’s searches for Carmen led her to others that were interesting: entertaining chefs, cam girls and celebrities who had inadvertently gained weight, and women who stuffed themselves gleefully and meticulously tracked the progress that they were making as they added pounds to their bodies.

While she found some favorites, Hannah was consistently drawn back to Carmen. She fantasized about what it would be like to be her, growing in size and in confidence before an audience, flaunting her curves, letting people know that her size and her personality might be too much for some people, but that she was unapologetically EXTRA.

Hannah was spending more and more time eating, browsing, and fantasizing. She wiled away hours, grazing through dishes meant to serve 4-6 while focusing on flattering photos of Carmen and the others and the encouraging remarks made by their adoring, anonymous audiences. She hadn’t been to the gym in weeks, and wasn’t really missing it.

Not surprisingly, Hannah found that her new clothes were becoming progressively ill-fitting, and one morning, after squeezing herself into an outfit, she began to reckon with herself. As opposed to her indifferent response previously, this time Hannah found herself conflicted. She had gained weight, to be sure, but how much? Was she getting fat? What did she expect, sitting around all day, eating and not going to the gym? She dusted off an old bathroom scale and stepped on. The digital display bounced around before settling at 162. 162?! She felt her breasts, straining a bra that now dug into her back.She was getting huge!

“Hannah, you’re getting fat.”

“Eating all that food you’re cooking, Hannah?”

“If Hannah gets any fatter, she’s going to roll away.”

The thoughts were scrolling through her head like comments on a website, and then she paused.

“Keep eating, Hannah.”

“You look amazing, Hannah!”

“Will that recipe give me boobs like you, Hannah? I’ll make a double batch!”

“Hannah, that body is EXTRA!”

Just as she focused on the good things that were said online, she magnified them in her brain. And she knew what she would do next: get some better fitting clothes. But first, brunch...she had been craving a cream cheese French toast recipe that she had learned from Carmen a couple of weeks earlier.

From that moment forward, Hannah began to embrace what had been a desire hiding in plain sight. She wanted to live confidently, showing off her body, feasting on decadent meals, and feeding off of the positive attention. She devoured the desired French toast as she admired Carmen’s largesse, and then made her way to the shopping center, where she loaded up on push up bras, low cut tops, and tight clothing of all manner before having some ice cream, just because.

“Some people might think it’s a bit much, but I’m EXTRA.” She said, before tackling him onto the couch and smothering his face with her boobs. As he grabbed at her, all she could think about was how she was just getting started.

Sycamore Hills, a lovely name for a lovely town.

Where this town resides on the map is relatively unimportant, only that it resides in Northern American. A small stateside community that could easily exist anywhere, the urban streets of Sycamore Hills are just like any other. Children play around cars that drive between them, throwing baseballs and fiddling with their latest electronic gadgets. Young couples patrol the sidewalks daily, not giving two licks about whom or what resides outside their sweetheart’s embrace. Mothers push strollers while fathers talk on cell phones discussing business or the football game. Or sometimes in reverse order, Sycamore Hills is pretty progressive about that kind of thing.

Buildings aren’t all that tall, but far from humble. A few big businesses have popped up here and there in Sycamore Hills, bringing new faces almost every day in the grand name of Big Business. The commonplaces don’t stand to gain much attention, a McDonald’s here or a WalMart there, those things some people can’t live without. The largest building in the Hills (as the Sycamorians do call it) is about seven stories tall, the new church in the middle of the valley. Other than that though, Sycamore Hills doesn’t see much.

Unfortunately, with all these big businesses and new faces popping up, we’ve lost a couple people too. Old Mr. and Ms. Ware were taken just a little bit over a year ago. A real shame, he was one of the best mechanics in town and she cooked the meanest cherry pie you could ever hope to taste. But, as all do eventually, they passed and moved on.

Interestingly enough, they left their house to their granddaughter Jane, knowing that she would take good care of the place after they’d gone. Jane was a young college student at the time, and felt that a change of scenery was just what she needed. So, a year ago to the day, she packed up her things and moved into their two stories, two-bedroom home that had stood since 1953. She enrolled online to make better use of her time, now that she wouldn’t be living on campus anymore and started out to get a job but… well, time makes fools of us all.

Luckily for Jane, she’s got a good set of parents who’ve got a good offset of cash to help keep their daughter’s lights on. And again, luckily for Jane, they’re in the dark about her falling behind on her classes.

But that’s old news. No, the real story is what’s going on with Jane now…

***


Jane let out a heavy huff of exertion, her weekly jog around the block leaving her rather winded after having missed the last twenty sessions or so. It was winter time in Sycamore Hills and it grew rather cold, which Jane found very desirable for a workout; she didn’t sweat so much and could attempt to “hide” her less than ideal shape.

Dressed in a blue zip-up hoodie, her ginger hair fell awkwardly as sweat matted her bangs down to her forehead. Gray yoga pants were ripped up the side, she had tripped, and her sneakers were covered in mud. Her glasses were foggy from her heated face and she couldn’t breathe all too well after a morning of “witnessing the fitnessing”. From her busty upper half to her chafing hamhock thighs, poor Jane was burning up in the middle of October. She peeled off her hoodie, revealing her gray Help! shirt underneath, and plod uselessly into the kitchen.

She fumbled around for a bit, finding everything needed for a cup of coffee. Jane’s life was a stressful one, you see. Being a freelance writer without any endorsement was hard, what stories she had sold weren’t bringing home much to impress her folks. Her name was out there sure, but as what she could only guess the worst.

Which was why she had decided to bring in a roommate.

Her parents had been harping on her about her high cost of living. A new computer, new kitchen appliances, and not one mention of textbooks- they were starting to get suspicious. So, rather than own up to dropping out of college, she decided to wow them with getting a roomie to help pay the bills, and dazzle them when one of her books finally hit the shelves!

And what’s more, rather than splurge for an ad in the paper like some chump, Jane had just the woman in mind.
